text: ai ahale kitaab tumhaare paas hamaara paigambar (mohammad sall) aa chuka jo kitaabe khuda kee un baaton mein se jinhen tum chhupaaya karate the bahuteree to saaf saaf bayaan kar dega aur bahuteree se (amadan) daraguzar karega tumhare paas to khuda kee taraf se ek (chamakata hua) noor aur saaf saaf bayaan karane vaalee kitaab (kuraan) aa chukee hai
